author: Lego7755Fan2
title: Just and expander pack for your Monorail
review: This is just a monorail expander pack, so if you are tired of your monorail set up, this expands it. Unlike the 6921, it contains a switch set and ramps, and more track. No figs, not much play value, but value when you have a monorail! To bad there is not a layout to expand the Airport Shuttle.

author: DunksterBricks
title: The Best Accessory Set for Monorail!
review:
To correct the previous review, this set does not contain slopes.  The image posted here reflects what can be built when this set, 6347 is combined with the Airport Shuttle set 6399.

Set 6347 contains: 2x switches, 4x large curves, 2x small curves, 4x very short straights, 2x long straights and the 1x4 plates to connect the pieces of tracks together.  There are also 10 of the larger support pillars included.

Below is a video showing the un-boxing of this set.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IG_qC-Qe9Z0
